version_description:
• Better Call Blocking now blocks known scam and robo callers instantly (iOS 10.1+)
• It is now easier to Blacklist unwanted callers and report new threats to the community
• Big beautiful iPad layout in portrait mode
• Dynamic text size makes for easy reading of messages and options
• Improved support experience means you'll get help faster if you need it

- Phone no longer rings when any confirmed or suspected spammer calls (if block permission on)
- Much more timely updates of YouMail's system blacklist
- Call history extended to be alternate to message list for playing/reading voicemails
- YouMail Professional users can now call/text on their extra lines, and see better line identification
- Too many performance improvements and bug fixes to count



-
Bug fixes and improvements

- Phone no longer rings when any confirmed or suspected spammer calls (if block permission on)
- Much more timely updates of YouMail's system blacklist
- Call history extended to be alternate to message list for playing/reading voicemails
- YouMail Professional users can now call/text on their extra lines, and see better line identification
- Too many performance improvements and bug fixes to count

- Enhanced Call Blocking
- Smarter Notifications
- iOS 11 and iPhone X Optimizations
- Better Extra Line call back and texting
- Bug fixes and Improvements

You asked, we listened! You'll now have the ability to add custom number ranges for blocking. Fighting back against neighborhood spoofing just got a lot easier!  We also squashed a few bugs and added more iOS 14 enhancements.
• Minor fixes and improvements
• Minor fixes and improvements

You asked and we answered. Introducing our most organized voicemail inbox yet. With YouMail 5.5, you can now easily search, filter, and manage your voicemails from one beautifully-designed screen. Plus, we've fixed some minor bugs and enhanced performance.
Various bug fixes.

What's new with YouMail? For starters, we've improved accessibility on the blocking screen thanks to a great suggestion by our users. You can also now organize your contacts into groups (such as Besties, Family or any name you choose), create a personalized greetings for each group and more. Plus, we've improved performance and fixed a few bugs.
Bug fixes and minor improvements.
Bug fixes and minor improvements.
Fixed a few bugs and other improvements.
Bug fixes and minor improvements.

What's new? Some amazing updates. We’ve polished up the Inbox, People, and Recents screens and they are easier to navigate than ever before. We've made spam calls easier to identify in your recent history. Plus, we've added some fun animations in the app! If you've found them, feel free to let us know if you like them on social media!

Hey YouMailers! We're excited to bring another great update to you with improved security for password changes. We also improved your setup experience with better activation codes and test calls to ensure you get set up and blocking robocalls on the first try. We also squashed a bug where certain text messages were not syncing correctly in the conversations screen.
This release contains a few bug fixes to address issues with logging in, viewing notifications and viewing deleted text messages.
This release contains minor bug fixes.

We're shipping some quick updates to make YouMail better for you. In this version we've clarified our robocall blocking options, refreshed our color scheme, and made text messaging easier to use. We also added more options for unlocking the app with biometrics - thanks Jim from 414!! And of course, we squashed a few minor bugs.
